meanings.sent1: The foxhunters rode on their horses through the countryside.
meanings.sent2: The foxhunters gathered early in the morning to begin their hunt.
meanings.sent3: The foxhunters were so focused on the chase that they accidentally followed a squirrel instead of a fox!
meanings.sent4: In the world of foxhunters, the thrill of the chase is like a dance with nature.
meanings.sent5: The image of the foxhunters in their traditional attire is a timeless sight.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who engage in the sport of foxhunting.
meanings.sent1: The local community admired the foxhunters for their dedication to the sport.
meanings.sent2: Every weekend, the foxhunters would set out on their adventure together.
meanings.sent3: The foxhunters organized a friendly competition to see who could find the fox first.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the foxhunters was as strong as the bond between a pack of wolves.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the horn signaled the start of the foxhunters' exciting pursuit.
